inclusion.criterion: Infected hydronephrosis due to ureteric stone or ureteric stricture.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a contraindication to either form of drainage (uncorrected coagulopathy,
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: urethral stricture disease, bladder outlet obstruction, pregnancy, ureteral stone greater than 15 mm., or Steinstrasse).

notes: Patient has a history of CAD and recently noted abdominal mass with fevers/rigors and bandemia. CT abdomen showed a large heterogeneous left upper abdominal mass consistent with pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
